data.title: OMG! I think I heard?
data.meta_description: You all may remember my blind error?  Well I go by voices more than looks, which is one of the reasons I love Zack soo much.  But I digress.  I am 99 percent that I heard Cameron Mathason in a movie?  I heard him on espn…
data.text:
Quote Fan In Huskerland: Hi Angelo...

Don’t Panic… I just saw what you heard. It was a commercial for ESPN Fantasy Baseball, starring a montage of ABC Soapstars. You did indeed hear Cameron Mathison mention his wife and the lottery… it was Rebecca Budig sitting next to the bedside of the actor who plays Rex Balsom on One Life to Live… I don’t know his real name… It was a funny commercial… hope this helps… Jackie
